articles.author: Tyler Thompson
articles.title: Mark Pope on Kentucky's technical fouls: 'I wouldn't trade the heart of it for anything' - On3
articles.description: The three technical fouls in 38 seconds on Kentucky in the second half could have swung the game, but the Cats rallied instead, making Mark Pope very proud.
articles.content: Twenty-five minutes in, tonights game seemed almost too good to be true. Kentucky had gotten off to a hot start vs. Arkansas, leading by seven at the first media timeout and at halftime. The Razorbac… [+2583 chars]

articles.title: AI layoffs or ‘AI-washing’? - TechCrunch
articles.description: How many of the companies with recent layoffs are just using AI as an excuse?
articles.content: How many of the companies with recent layoffs are truly adapting their workforces to the efficiencies and challenges of artificial intelligence? And how many of them were just using AI as an excuse t… [+909 chars]
